name: fix-yaml-config-propagation
description: Debug pattern for fixing YAML config fields that aren't propagating to execution, plus eliminating DRY violations in config dataclasses
author: Claude Sonnet 4.5
key_learnings: Trace config from YAML → Parser → Dataclass → Execution
Look for hardcoded values that override config
Check for DRY violations when fixing config bugs
Remove duplicate fields after fixing propagation
Mark deprecated code paths with clear documentation
commits: 0cda14f - fix(e2e): propagate system_prompt_mode from subtest YAML to command building
2de6322 - refactor(e2e): remove duplicate system_prompt_mode from TierConfig
